body.p:
148
Oct. 16th 3
Richd J. Yarbor
Henderson -- Ky.
Sir,

Your letter to the Governor has been referred to this Department. While we regret the injustice you seem to have received, it is beyond the power of the Authorities here, to recall the muster-in, as your company is now in the service of the United States, and beyond our control.
If Col. Starling will recommend you to fill the first vacancy occurring in his regiment, your claimss will receive due consideration.

Respectfully
Your obt servt
John Boyle
Adjt. Gen. of Ky
